itunes:title: EPISODE 292: They All Lied About the Vaccine and We Have Them on Tape
title: EPISODE 292: They All Lied About the Vaccine and We Have Them on Tape
description:
“Get the vaccine! Get the vaccine! It will help stop the spread!” The left all LIED to you about the vaccine stopping transmission, so we can fine them all $955 million dollars - right? Speaking of liars, George Floyd’s family is suing Kanye West for saying he died of fentanyl; but wait, Poso breaks down the coroner’s report which shows he actually did have a lethal fentanyl cocktail in his system. Next, six women accused CHAZ warlord Raz Simone of sex trafficking, alleging that the police ‘did virtually nothing’. Finally, the newly coronated chairman for life of the CCP, Xi Jinping, may cancel the G20 meeting with President Biden.



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to patriotmobile.com/poso/ or call 972-PATRIOT to get free activation with offer code POSO


Buy three boxers and get one free by going to GETUNDERTAC.COM with offer code POSO
